metadata.name: /the-algorithm Open Edition
metadata.description:
In a groundbreaking moment for tech, Elon Musk has made the algorithm powering Twitter's recommendation system open-source, marking a significant development for tech.

This momentous occasion underscores the significant strides being made in the field of AI and highlights the increasing role technology is playing in our lives. As one of the world's most influential tech leaders, Elon Musk's contributions to the industry have been groundbreaking, and this moment is no exception.

However, it's important to recognize the darker side of social media recommendation algorithms. These algorithms are often used for mass manipulation of young people and for political gain.

This collection aims to commemorate a significant moment in technology history by creating an NFT that depicts the system diagram of the Twitter Recommendation Algorithm, which will be securely stored on the blockchain, ensuring its longevity and authenticity.
